attributes.action: David Cameron - Vote of No Confidence
attributes.additional_details:
Following the revelations in regard to the Phone Hacking Scandal and Prime Minister David Cameron’s repeated refusal to answer direct questions relating to the appointment of Andy Coulson, we the undersigned no longer have any confidence in the decision making and honesty of the Prime Minister.

We therefore demand that a Motion of Confidence be undertaken to determine whether the Prime Minister still retains the confidence of the House or whether they believe, as we do, that he should be replaced for the good of the country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament not Government.
